description:
Non-material minor amendment of planning permission reference P110631 dated 7 July 2011 for the Application to vary the wording of conditions 28 (Sound Insulation), 39 (Code for Sustainable Homes / BREEAM), 46 (Energy Strategy - bio-diesel CHP facility) and 54 (landscaping) of planning permission ref: P092469 dated 21/12/2010 for the: 'Demolition of buildings and the partial demolition of the rear of Loxford House, change of use and the erection of a four storey rear extension to Loxford House including the provision of 297sqm of nursery/cr√®che/ community facility (Class D1) and the erection of part 3, 4 and 5 storey flatted blocks, houses and town houses providing for a total of 143 residential dwellings together with the creation of a new publicly accessible open space, car parking, cycle parking, landscaping and other associated works.' The amendments involve:
a) the creation of a mezzanine level within 4 of the flats. 
b) the introduction of a lower ground floor within the approved duplex apartment to create a triplex apartment within Loxford House.
c) internal reconfiguration in order to rationalise layouts.
